amendment.description: To ensure the fiscal year 2004 overtime cap applies to certain Customs Service employees.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3611 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3611 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S9194-9195; text: CR S9194) To ensure the fiscal year 2004 overtime cap applies to certain Customs Service employees.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3611 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3611 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Mikulski.
